H0.text: Asteroids are the small, rocky bodies that orbit the sun.

H1.text: Comets are small, rocky bodies that orbit the sun.

H2.text: Meteorites are small, rocky bodies that orbit the sun.

H3.text: Fossils are the small, rocky bodies that orbit the sun.

A4.text: Asteroids are rocky, metallic, or icy bodies... larger than a meteoroid (thus 1 meter or larger)

A5.text: A年底 shows a coma (tail) due to sublimation of its near-surface ices by solar radiation
